column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The fact that you can place your order while you are waiting for table is ingenious. We went on a whim based on fellow yelp reviews. The place was crowded when we got there
column2: and by the looks of it
column3: it always is! We had the melnetis original butter crust pizza. It was definitely good
column5: not life changing. Based on reviews
column6: I guess I was expecting much
